sourcesContent:
import axios from 'axios' import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react' import { Container, Row, Col, Image, Card, Table, Button } from 'react-bootstrap' import { Pencil } from 'react-bootstrap-icons'; import { useAuth0 } from '@auth0/auth0-react' import '../styles/AccountManager.css' //Zaprojektowanie zarządzania użytkownikiem export default function AccountManager() { const [source, setSource] = useState({ source: null }) const [userInfo, setUserInfo] = useState() const { user } = useAuth0(); const getAvatar = () => { var url = "http://localhost:5000/getAvatar" axios.get(url, { responseType: 'arraybuffer' }) .then(response => { setSource(encodeImage(response.data)) }) } const getInfo = () => { //Do napisania odbiór info var url = "http://localhost:5000/getInfo" if (user != undefined) { axios.post(url, { email: user.email }) .then(resp => { setUserInfo(resp.data) console.log(resp.data) }) } } function encodeImage(arrayBuffer) { let b64encoded = btoa([].reduce.call(new Uint8Array(arrayBuffer), function (p, c) { return p + String.fromCharCode(c) }, '')) let mimetype = "image/png" return "data:" + mimetype + ";base64," + b64encoded } useEffect(() => { getInfo() }, [user]) useEffect(() => { getInfo() getAvatar() }, []) return ( Profil Twoje informacje {userInfo &&
Nazwa użytkownika {userInfo.nickname}
Imię i nazwisko {userInfo.firstname} {userInfo.surname}
Data urodzenia {userInfo.dateOfBirth}
Adres e-mail {userInfo.email}
} ) }
